video.title: Wilfred (AU)
video.synopsis: A deeply depressed man has surreal experiences after becoming convinced that his neighbor's dog, Wilfred, is actually a man wearing a costume.

episodes.synopsis: When Adam is invited back to Sarah's place after meeting her at a concert, it seems too good to be true -- until he's introduced to her dog, Wilfred.
episodes.title: There is a Dog

episodes.synopsis: Adam and Sarah's relationship is blossoming, and Sarah takes the opportunity to tell Adam how important it is that he and Wilfred get along.
episodes.title: Dog Day Afterglow

episodes.synopsis: Sarah is aware of the growing tension between Wilfred and Adam and calls a meeting demanding a ceasefire.
episodes.title: Dogs of War

episodes.synopsis: While at the beach, Adam and Wilfred get caught in a rip. Wilfred swims to shore, but lifeguards have to save Adam.
episodes.title: Walking the Dog

episodes.synopsis: TV vet Jack Underwood has come to help Wilfred with his behavioral problems, but Wilfred convinces him that Adam is the one with the problems.
episodes.title: The Dog Whisperer

episodes.synopsis: Sarah sees an "old friend" on TV, and Adam and Wilfred get jealous when the well-known film star and his dog turn up at their doorstep.
episodes.title: Dog Eat Dog

episodes.synopsis: Two dog catchers ask Wilfred if there is a reason why he isn't wearing a collar. There isn't one. So the catchers have to take him to the station.
episodes.title: Barking Behind Bars

episodes.synopsis: After Sarah breaks up with Adam, Wilfred gets Adam to do something unexpected -- and with disastrous results.
episodes.title: This Dog's Life

episodes.synopsis: Adam decides that the only way to stop fighting with Sarah is to ask her to marry him. But what has Wilfred done with the engagement ring?
episodes.title: Kiss Me Kat

episodes.synopsis: Sarah takes Adam home to Nambour to meet her family and get nude while Wilfred rekindles hostilities with his old man.
episodes.title: Dog of a Town: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Arthur continues to bully Wilfred until they partake in a particularly vicious game of force 'em back, from which only one dog will emerge alive.
episodes.title: Dog of a Town: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When Sarah goes away for her last piece of pre-wedding freedom, Wilfred takes the opportunity to bully Adam and eat up a storm.
episodes.title: Honey You're Killing the Dog

episodes.synopsis: A holiday in the snow takes a bad turn when Wilfred, Adam and Sarah meet sexed-up Swedish couple Lars and Hilda and their dog, Annika.
episodes.title: Ice Dog Cometh

episodes.synopsis: Wilfred is romancing Caddy, one of the local dogs, while Adam and Sarah receive a visit from Adam's extraordinarily good-looking and clever brother.
episodes.title: The Dog Father

episodes.synopsis: Sarah's mad that Adam still doesn't have a job, as she doesn't want to marry an unemployed guy. Wilfred wonders why he's not in a TV commercial.
episodes.title: Dog Star

episodes.synopsis: Adam needs money for the rings as Sarah is adamant: no rings, no wedding. Wilfred thinks he'll be able to earn the money by taking part in a dogfight.
episodes.title: Bite Club
